channel.title: Scripting help
channel.description:
I guess you don't really need to know the complications of the script....but whenever I run it, it gets up to procedure attack; and then it goes to procedure death; It is also just a draft, im just trying to get it working before i edit it to make it clean. It's for my friend, who can't get srl to work on his computer, so that's out of the question too.
[scar] program New; var a,b,c,d,e,f,g,h,i,j,k,l,m,n,kounter,counter,failure:integer; count:string; procedure counting; begin counter :=0 end; procedure healspells; begin kounter :=0 repeat//healing wait(1000) until(findcolor(a,b,9250560,400,700,405,710)) wait(1000) MoveMouse(751,620) wait(100) ClickMouse(751,620,true) repeat//waiting for battle wait(1000) until(findcolor(c,d,65535,507,629,515,635)) repeat//spelling wait(1000) MoveMouse(486,473) wait(100) ClickMouse(486,473,true) wait(2000) MoveMouse(628,601) wait(100) ClickMouse(628,601,true) repeat//waiting for spelling wait(1000) until(findcolor(c,d,65535,507,629,515,635)) kounter :=kounter+1 until(kounter=4) end; procedure death; begin wait(100) MoveMouse(505,502) wait(100) ClickMouse(505,502,true) wait(5500) MoveMouse(407,440) wait(100) ClickMouse(407,440,true) wait(100) ClickMouse(407,440,true) wait(5000) MoveMouse(751,620) wait(100) ClickMouse(751,620,true) repeat//waiting for battle wait(1000) until(findcolor(c,d,65535,507,629,515,635)) end; procedure levelup; begin wait(100) MoveMouse(507,485) wait(100) ClickMouse(507,485,true) healspells; end; procedure ztokens; begin wait(100) MoveMouse(500,574) wait(100) ClickMouse(500,574,true) healspells; end; procedure attack; begin repeat//attacking failure := BitmapFromString(17, 12, 'z78DAE593310EC0200845A' + 'F048856470CF1FE472AC674ABA9D1D8C537BC49FF4F10D583A107' + '58B49A0BBCC2541D17F25327B9479099161498403CA4B1FC36811' + '5465AB8FCD1F21C45B7B3A5ED954DD85E26470A9FBEC8EE652607' + '98D1D6CEE9317F709F6F0DBEF4FB'); wait(2000) MoveMouse(495,424) wait(100) ClickMouse(495,424,true) If findbitmapin(failure,e,f,549,384,580,409) then wait(3000) Death; until(findcolor(g,h,13395456,368,305,376,314)) wait(3000) MoveMouse(502,547) wait(100) ClickMouse(502,547,true) end; procedure zlvl; begin wait(3000) If findcolor(k,l,1145006,585,439,589,443) then Ztokens; wait(3000) If findcolor(m,n,6750207,729,285,733,291) then Levelup; end; procedure blah; begin writeln('blah') repeat wait(1000) until(findcolor(i,j,2385472,432,260,437,265)) counter :=counter+1 count :=inttostr(counter) writeln(count+'monsters battled') end; begin repeat healspells; attack; zlvl; blah; until(false) end. [/scar]

item.title: Scripting help
item.dc:creator: @Monkmonk693 Monkmonk693
item.description:
@Monkmonk693 wrote:

The script is for battleon, but since it’s a prototype it will only work on my computer sorry…
Ok I tried it, but the Death; part has to be in the procedure attack loop–if you die, the victory sign wont come up. The victory sign has the color that triggors the end of the loop, so it would also need to stop if the defeat sign comes up.

Read full topic

item.title: Scripting help
item.dc:creator: @Monkmonk693 Monkmonk693
item.description:
@Monkmonk693 wrote:

I’m at my friends house right now…looks good though and i’ll try it when I get home. Thanks alot!

Read full topic

item.title: Scripting help
item.dc:creator: @junior junior
item.description:
@junior wrote:

I did some minor changes to your script…
Im not quite sure if this is what your looking for but tell me if it works anyway.
~jR

[scar]program New;
var a,b,c,d,e,f,g,h,i,j,k,l,m,n,kounter,counter,failure:integer;
count:string;
procedure counting;
begin
counter :=0
end;
procedure healspells;
begin
kounter :=0
repeat//healing
wait(1000)
until(findcolor(a,b,9250560,400,700,405,710))
wait(1000)
MoveMouse(751,620)
wait(100)
ClickMouse(751,620,true)
repeat//waiting for battle
wait(1000)
until(findcolor(c,d,65535,507,629,515,635))
repeat//spelling
wait(1000)
MoveMouse(486,473)
wait(100)
ClickMouse(486,473,true)
wait(2000)
MoveMouse(628,601)
wait(100)
ClickMouse(628,601,true)
repeat//waiting for spelling
wait(1000)
until(findcolor(c,d,65535,507,629,515,635))
kounter :=kounter+1
until(kounter=4)
end;
procedure death;
begin
wait(100)
MoveMouse(505,502)
wait(100)
ClickMouse(505,502,true)
wait(5500)
MoveMouse(407,440)
wait(100)
ClickMouse(407,440,true)
wait(100)
ClickMouse(407,440,true)
wait(5000)
MoveMouse(751,620)
wait(100)
ClickMouse(751,620,true)
repeat//waiting for battle
wait(1000)
until(findcolor(c,d,65535,507,629,515,635))
end;
procedure levelup;
begin
wait(100)
MoveMouse(507,485)
wait(100)
ClickMouse(507,485,true)
healspells;
end;
procedure ztokens;
begin
wait(100)
MoveMouse(500,574)
wait(100)
ClickMouse(500,574,true)
healspells;
end;
procedure attack;
begin
repeat//attacking
failure := BitmapFromString(17, 12, ‘z78DAE593310EC0200845A’ +
‘F048856470CF1FE472AC674ABA9D1D8C537BC49FF4F10D583A107’ +
‘58B49A0BBCC2541D17F25327B9479099161498403CA4B1FC36811’ +
‘5465AB8FCD1F21C45B7B3A5ED954DD85E26470A9FBEC8EE652607’ +
‘98D1D6CEE9317F709F6F0DBEF4FB’);
wait(2000)
MoveMouse(495,424)
wait(100)
ClickMouse(495,424,true)
until(findcolor(g,h,13395456,368,305,376,314))
if(findcolor(g,h,13395456,368,305,376,314))then
begin
wait(3000)
MoveMouse(502,547)
wait(100)
ClickMouse(502,547,true)
end;
end;
procedure zlvl;
begin
wait(3000)
If findcolor(k,l,1145006,585,439,589,443) then
begin
Ztokens;
wait(3000)
If findcolor(m,n,6750207,729,285,733,291) then
begin
Levelup;
If findbitmapin(failure,e,f,549,384,580,409) then
begin
wait(3000)
Death;
end;
end;
end;
end;
procedure blah;
begin
writeln(‘blah’)
repeat
wait(1000)
until(findcolor(i,j,2385472,432,260,437,265))
counter :=counter+1
count :=inttostr(counter)
writeln(count+‘monsters battled’)
end;
begin
repeat
healspells;
attack;
zlvl;
blah;
until(false)
end.[/scar]

Read full topic

item.title: Scripting help
item.dc:creator: @Monkmonk693 Monkmonk693
item.description:
@Monkmonk693 wrote:

I guess you don’t really need to know the complications of the script…but whenever I run it, it gets up to procedure attack; and then it goes to procedure death; It is also just a draft, im just trying to get it working before i edit it to make it clean. It’s for my friend, who can’t get srl to work on his computer, so that’s out of the question too.

[scar]
program New;
var a,b,c,d,e,f,g,h,i,j,k,l,m,n,kounter,counter,failure:integer;
count:string;
procedure counting;
begin
counter :=0
end;
procedure healspells;
begin
kounter :=0
repeat//healing
wait(1000)
until(findcolor(a,b,9250560,400,700,405,710))
wait(1000)
MoveMouse(751,620)
wait(100)
ClickMouse(751,620,true)
repeat//waiting for battle
wait(1000)
until(findcolor(c,d,65535,507,629,515,635))
repeat//spelling
wait(1000)
MoveMouse(486,473)
wait(100)
ClickMouse(486,473,true)
wait(2000)
MoveMouse(628,601)
wait(100)
ClickMouse(628,601,true)
repeat//waiting for spelling
wait(1000)
until(findcolor(c,d,65535,507,629,515,635))
kounter :=kounter+1
until(kounter=4)
end;
procedure death;
begin
wait(100)
MoveMouse(505,502)
wait(100)
ClickMouse(505,502,true)
wait(5500)
MoveMouse(407,440)
wait(100)
ClickMouse(407,440,true)
wait(100)
ClickMouse(407,440,true)
wait(5000)
MoveMouse(751,620)
wait(100)
ClickMouse(751,620,true)
repeat//waiting for battle
wait(1000)
until(findcolor(c,d,65535,507,629,515,635))
end;
procedure levelup;
begin
wait(100)
MoveMouse(507,485)
wait(100)
ClickMouse(507,485,true)
healspells;
end;
procedure ztokens;
begin
wait(100)
MoveMouse(500,574)
wait(100)
ClickMouse(500,574,true)
healspells;
end;
procedure attack;
begin
repeat//attacking
failure := BitmapFromString(17, 12, ‘z78DAE593310EC0200845A’ +
‘F048856470CF1FE472AC674ABA9D1D8C537BC49FF4F10D583A107’ +
‘58B49A0BBCC2541D17F25327B9479099161498403CA4B1FC36811’ +
‘5465AB8FCD1F21C45B7B3A5ED954DD85E26470A9FBEC8EE652607’ +
‘98D1D6CEE9317F709F6F0DBEF4FB’);
wait(2000)
MoveMouse(495,424)
wait(100)
ClickMouse(495,424,true)
If findbitmapin(failure,e,f,549,384,580,409) then
wait(3000)
Death;
until(findcolor(g,h,13395456,368,305,376,314))
wait(3000)
MoveMouse(502,547)
wait(100)
ClickMouse(502,547,true)
end;
procedure zlvl;
begin
wait(3000)
If findcolor(k,l,1145006,585,439,589,443) then
Ztokens;
wait(3000)
If findcolor(m,n,6750207,729,285,733,291) then
Levelup;
end;
procedure blah;
begin
writeln(‘blah’)
repeat
wait(1000)
until(findcolor(i,j,2385472,432,260,437,265))
counter :=counter+1
count :=inttostr(counter)
writeln(count+‘monsters battled’)
end;
begin
repeat
healspells;
attack;
zlvl;
blah;
until(false)
end.
[/scar]
